about_the_game:
AN EXILED PRINCESS..

Follow the adventure of Kalen, a mushroom-like exiled princess, and immerse yourself in a journey through ancient forests filled with secrets and strange inhabitants, forgotten ruins, and, ultimately, greater foes like special bosses and untamed beasts.
But she's not alone!
Throughout the game, you'll switch between Kalen and Akiro, a mysterious lone warrior whose destiny is intertwined with our heroine's.
One fate, two souls, and many worlds to explore!



Meet Kalen, our cozy, mushroom-like heroine!

A NEW SOULSVANIA

Parallel Destiny is a story-based Metroidvania with Souls-like elements, featuring two special playable characters and an intriguing art style that immerses the player completely in its realms.

EXPLORE THE DEEPNESS OF THE FOREST

Draw your own maps, learn everything about the lore of each realm, and collect every unique item and skill. Every new secret will unveil a new piece of the mosaic.
During your journey, you may also encounter friendly characters like citizens of hidden villages and chummy merchants willing to share their goods with you, all scattered throughout the game.

CUSTOM ORCHESTRAL SOUNDTRACK

To inspire you during your odyssey through the realms of Parallel Destiny, you'll hear a dedicated orchestral soundtrack. From the whispering chants of the eerie forest to the dreadfulness of facing a mighty, horrendous boss, and finally, the serenity of reaching the safety of a village or saving spots (bonfires).

THE BEAUTY OF PARALLEL DESTINY ARTSTYLE

name: Parallel Destiny

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7+
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Escape the magical forest full of mushrooms and insects! Control 2 characters where you battle, befriend strange creatures and connect their Parallel Destiny.
